definition: to extend as long as/to lengthen out to
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent

sentences.english: Residents of many major urban areas complain of 20-hour-long daily blackouts.
sentences.chinese: 很多大城市的居民抱怨每天斷電時間長達20小時。

sentences.english: He was wronged as a Rightist in 1957, thus keeping silent for over 21 years.
sentences.chinese: 1957年被錯劃右派，從此沉寂長達二十一年。

sentences.english: In 1981, a seven - week - old Major League Baseball strike ended.
sentences.chinese: 1981年，美國職業棒球長達七週大聯盟罷工結束。

sentences.english: Orangutan mothers face up to eight years of single parenthood raising their infants.
sentences.chinese: 猩猩母親則要做長達八年的獨自養育幼兒的單親家長。

sentences.english: The development of the game has taken two years but advanced orders are impressive.
sentences.chinese: 開發製作該遊戲軟件長達兩年，但預定貨量十分喜人。

sentences.english: It looks like a 500-foot-long red snake.
sentences.chinese: 它看上去像一條長達500英尺的紅蛇。

sentences.english: Another example of the gravity arch dam, this one has a crest of almost eleven hundred meters in length.
sentences.chinese: 這又是一座重力拱壩，頂部長達1100多米。

sentences.english: After that, she is put on the anti-estrogen Tamoxifen for five years.
sentences.chinese: 之後，她服用抗雌激素的三苯氧胺長達五年。
這是一班飛行時間長達11小時的飛機。

sentences.english: It's said she’d been trapped in her kitchen with her grandson for nine days.
sentences.chinese: 據信，她和自己的孫子被困在廚房中長達九天的時間。

sentences.english: The bridge is a hundred meters long.
The full, 57-minute podcast is highly recommended.
sentences.chinese: 我向各位大力推薦這部長達57分鐘的播客。

sentences.english: It took me as long as three hours to climb the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 我用了長達三個小時的時間才爬上那座山。

sentences.english: Shown in the figure is 100 feet long aquarium submarine channels.
sentences.chinese: 圖中所示的是水族館內長達100英尺的海底通道。

sentences.english: The collapse of the Han dynasty was followed by nearly four centuries of rule by warlords.
sentences.chinese: 漢朝滅亡後是長達四個世紀的軍閥割據時代。

sentences.english: "[The Danish text] destroyed two years of effort in one fell swoop," De Boer wrote.
sentences.chinese: 一舉摧毀了長達兩年的努力，”在信中德波爾寫道。

definition: to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
Gundam, Japanese animation franchise/Jean-Luc Godard (1930-), French-Swiss film director
to unfold/to carry out/to be in full swing/to launch
